name: Leeching Strikes
description: Imbue your weapons with soul-stealing power, causing your Light and Heavy Attacks to heal you for 1452 Health and restore 106 Stamina for 20 seconds. Fully-charged Heavy Attacks restore twice the value.  You restore up to 4270 additional Stamina when the effect ends, based on the length of time Leeching Strikes was active.
effectLines: Converts into a Stamina ability. Restores Stamina when you Light and Heavy Attack and when the effect ends.
rawDescription:
Imbue your weapons with soul-stealing power, causing your Light and Heavy Attacks to heal you for <<1>> Health and restore <<2>> Stamina for <<3>>. Fully-charged Heavy Attacks restore twice the value.

You restore up to <<4>> additional Stamina when the effect ends, based on the length of time <<5>> was active.
